section.title: What is Trunk?
section.para: "Trunk" refers to the latest, "bleeding-edge" development version of eXist-db. In contrast to the latest "stable" release that has been thoroughly tested and documented, trunk contains features in development. Running trunk requires advanced software development skills—most notably, the ability to use Subversion.

section.title: Getting Trunk
section.para: Trunk resides in eXist-db's subversion repository, so downloading a local copy of the source code, or "checking out" the source code, requires that you have a subversion client.
